response.overview: It's high noon when a showdown takes place between Black and White, two classic gunslingers. A vicious bell of justice rings as the two prepare to duel. It seems the world itself spins around this fight as glimpses of the feelings these two bear flash by, getting more and more intense until its seems only one can leave alive. But is that set in stone? If you BLINK you'll miss it.
response.tagline: If you BLINK you'll miss it.
response.title: B.L.I.N.K!
